title: 6 Spoons, "Raphael", patented 1874, produced late 19th century
markings: (a-f) On reverse of bowl: "PAT 74 STERLING", a lion, an anchor, G.
description: Ovoid bowl with frosted finish to interior. Tapering stem with small gadrooned knop below the pointed, rounded terminal which is stamped with scrolling vines and a dove on a matted ground. Obverse with monogrammed trefoil-topped heart-shaped reserve.

tombstone.epitaph:
6 Spoons, "Raphael", patented 1874, produced late 19th century.
patented 1874, produced late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1957-100-3-a/f.
